name: Gravity Stream
description: Gravity Stream was made for the 8 Bits to Infinity Time Jam. All art was made by me within GameMaker Studio 2 and Aseprite  while all sounds were sourced for free from Freesound.org. The game definitely follows the idea of a time limit more loosely, as it is more timer based, but I feel as though it still fits the theme as you are limited by the time you have before gravity switches, hence adding in a time limit.
